```{r, message = FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
class_sizes <- read_excel("data/class_sizes.xlsx")
```

```{r}
in_person <- filter(class_sizes, in_person == 1)
```

```{r}
in_person %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(
    n = n(),
    sd = sd(size),
    min = min(size),
    median = median(size),
    max = max(size)
  )
```

```{r}
in_person %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = factor(0), y = size))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  facet_wrap("year")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_blank())+
  theme(axis.ticks.x = element_blank())
```

```{r}
in_person %>% 
  group_by(department) %>% 
  summarise(
    n = n(),
    sd = sd(size),
    min = min(size),
    median = median(size),
    max = max(size)
  )
```
